div.p: Indicates whether the event succeeded or failed
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/security-event-outcome

tr.td: The operation completed successfully (whether with warnings or not).
The action was not successful due to some kind of catered for error (often equivalent to an HTTP 400 response).
The action was not successful due to some kind of unexpected error (often equivalent to an HTTP 500 response).
An error of such magnitude occurred that the system is not longer available for use (i.e. the system died).

description.value: Indicates whether the event succeeded or failed

definition.value: The operation completed successfully (whether with warnings or not).
The action was not successful due to some kind of catered for error (often equivalent to an HTTP 400 response).
The action was not successful due to some kind of unexpected error (often equivalent to an HTTP 500 response).
An error of such magnitude occurred that the system is not longer available for use (i.e. the system died).
